events.message: I have just submitted a claim regarding the recent car accident that occurred last night on Main Street.
The submitted claim has been categorised under auto accident based on the details provided about the collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle accident claim and will be contacting you shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle accident and are beginning the review process.
Please submit a copy of the police report, pictures of the accident scene, and your vehicle repair estimates.
All requested documents including police report and repair invoices have been successfully uploaded for review.
Our investigation team has started examining the details of the accident claim for liability and damage assessment.
The investigation has been completed; damages and liability have been determined based on the evidence collected.
A settlement offer has been prepared and sent to you reflecting the assessed damages and coverage limits.
You expressed concerns over the proposed settlement amount and requested a reassessment of the claim value.
Due to customer concerns, the claim has been escalated to a senior adjuster for further review.
Following reassessment, your claim has been approved with an updated settlement amount to cover repairs.
The settlement payment has been processed and issued to your account for the car repairs.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the completion of payment and repairs.
